title: Interpretation of a sad dead man in a dream An angry dead man in a dream

preview.html: The cry of the dead over an unmarried, married, and pregnant girl, if the dead person does not want to speak. The dead person is sad in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that if he sees in a dream a group of dead people sitting in great sadness and wearing unclean clothes, this means that this person will suffer from poverty. Extreme or that a loved one will commit immorality. Regarding bereavement, we know that grief is an emotion that we experience when we fail, break up, or are exposed to some event or situation that robs us of joy and sadness takes over in its place. Seeing the deceased sad usually does not mean the deceased and may not indicate him, But the interpretation is for the family of the deceased so that they are exposed to an event that may cause them grief or the dreamer if the deceased was a relative. While anger, in reality, we feel angry when we are exposed to harsh situations, insults, insults, and injustice, and often in a time of anger, our behavior and conduct are inappropriate for me. Seeing the dead person angry indicates An act that the dreamer may take that may cause him some trouble and that the other party will not accept. Here, the anger of the dead must be taken seriously, perhaps because things in your environment you may not feel. Such as the relationship with family members or the management of common things such as inheritance for example and other practices in life. When the dead is silent, you must know the reason for his silence and pay attention to his facial features and what Refers to him. His refusal to speak may be his dissatisfaction with the dreamer’s condition. The reluctance of the deceased to speak to the dreamer could also indicate a warning to the dreamer not to delve into a topic, especially if the dreamer asks a lot of questions. The condition of the deceased and the details of his face can give an idea to the dreamer through Measuring the message he wants to convey to him: A dead person who cries in a dream can express joy and happiness when a dead person cries and then stops crying, and the reason for this is that he saw his place in Paradise, and a dead person can cry in a dream because he saw a prophet. Or a friend in heaven, and they are often tears of repentance and forgiveness. If someone sees his deceased mother crying in a dream, this is a sign of love and contentment, because he will stop her tears and place her in her grave. Seeing the cry of the dead Seeing the dead crying in a dream after being happy indicates that this The person did not die following the religion of Islam and that this person was doing a lot of tricks in his life. However, if someone dreams in a dream that he sees a dead person and does not know this person and is sad, this means that this person commands the judgment of God and obeys his orders and does not pay attention to the people who want to push him. till then. He disobeyed. But if he sees a dead person sitting sad and wearing dirty clothes, this indicates that he is committing many sins, and this is a warning to him. Anger of the dead in a dream Seeing a dead person angry in a dream means that this person does many things that anger the dead person and he is not satisfied with them, or that this person It harms many of this person's relatives and they are dissatisfied with it. However, if one sees in a dream that the deceased does not want to talk and is sad, this may mean that the deceased is dissatisfied with the dreamer's condition, or it may indicate that this person is raising a problem and will expose him to many.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Adiyat in a dream, reading or listening

preview.html: Now the interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Al-Adiyat in a dream reading or listeningInterpretation of the vision of reading Surat Al-Adiyat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi.Interpretation of the dream of Surat Al-Adiyat in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of the dream of Surat Al-Adiyat in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees that he is reading it, he will provide for the mares and their connection.Interpretation of a dream about Surah Al-Adiyat in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of dreaming of Surat Al-Adiyat, and said: Whoever recites it or has it recited to him, then if he is a traveler, his path will be cut short, and if he is not a traveler, then he will love. The comfort of the world, or he loves the yoke of horses and sheep, and it is said that God Almighty has been remembered for a long time, and his life is long, and he is well praised. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Adiyat in a dream: Whoever reads it in a dream or something from it, or has it read to him, and if he is traveling, then his path falls, and if He was not a traveler, he loved the good things of this world. It was said that he loves the yoke of horses and sheep, and it is said that he is one of those who remember God often, prolong his life, and glorify Him for His goodness. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Adiyat in a dream for Al-Ahsa. Whoever reads it will love his companions and family, or go to war and love ordinary horses, or be victorious over the enemy, or someone will afflict him and persecute him and hope for this. It is a victory. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Adiyat in the dream of the Millennium. It came to the pink millennium: And the usual immorality nowadays, these roads are very blocked for the traveler. Whoever reads Surat Al-Adiyat in a dream or something like that, if he were a traveler, he would block his way. And if he is not a traveler, he loves feathers, and it is said that he loves tying Horses and sheep. God only knows.

title: Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a high place is one of the things that causes fear and panic for many people and makes them search for the interpretation of this vision and whether its connotations indicate good meanings or is there another meaning behind it, and through this article we will explain all of this to them. In the following lines, to reassure the viewer and not distract him with many interpretations. Interpretation of dreams about falling from a high place. Many of the most important interpretation scholars said that seeing falling from above in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to many great difficulties and disasters that will have a major negative impact on his life and not His presence. He finds solace and stability during this period, so he must return to God repeatedly in order to stand with him and support him. If a person sees himself falling from a height in his dream, this is a sign that he is trying to get rid of all the pressures and problems that he is exposed to during this period on an ongoing basis and that affect his life. Professional. To a great extent. As one of the great scholars explained, if the dreamer sees himself falling from a height during his sleep, this symbolizes that he has many dreams and aspirations that he wants to achieve in reality to make it a better future than this. Falling from a height while he is sleeping is a sign that God will stand up. By his side and helping him improve all his economic and social conditions and live a better life, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of falling from a high place by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing falling from a high place in a dream means that the dreamer will obtain all the things he sought in all previous periods to be A reason for having a successful and bright future. If someone sees himself falling from a height in his dream, this is a sign that he will travel abroad to find a good job, and this will be the reason that he will improve all the conditions of his family and meet many requirements that are the reason for their happiness. When he sees A man sees a child falling from a height in his dream, this symbolizes that he will be exposed to many major financial crises that will make him feel financial distress, and therefore he will be forced to use his mind to get rid of all these matters. And not to be exposed to more losses than that. If the dreamer sees someone he does not know falling from above during his sleep, this means that his life is exposed to many serious dangers, so he must be careful before taking any step in his life. For the dreamer to see someone he knows falling in his dream This indicates that there are many major problems and crises that will be the cause of his great suffering due to his inability to overcome them. What is the interpretation of falling from above in a dream for a single woman? The interpretation of seeing falling from above in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is planning her future in a way It is good that she receives many wishes and desires that are the reason for her reaching the desired situation. If a girl sees herself falling from a height and nothing happens to her in her dream, this is a sign that God will change her whole life for the better to compensate her for all the bad and sad days that she has gone through for a long time. Periods of her life. Surviving a fall from a high place while she was sleeping there

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling a house by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about selling a house varies from one vision to another, as it indicates many different interpretations that vary constantly according to the different events that occur during the vision, as well as the situation in which the viewer is, and who may be going through a difficult psychological situation or some crises in life in general. We will explain through our article the most important interpretations. To see a house sold in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of selling a house: Seeing yourself selling a house in a dream means that there are many different problems that the dreamer is currently facing and his inability to get rid of them. Seeing the dreamer’s house being sold in a dream means that he will suffer from great financial difficulties in the coming period and it will also make him He feels very sad. Whoever dreams that he is selling the house in which he lives, this is evidence that he will fail to achieve some of the desires that he seeks to achieve in life. Seeing yourself selling a house in a dream and feeling sad indicates some changes that will soon occur in the dreamer’s life. Vision Selling a house to an unknown person in a dream indicates that there are many mistakes that the dreamer commits and he must reconsider himself with them. Seeing the final sale of a house in a dream indicates the difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life and bearing more pressures and burdens. Selling a house and feeling happy in The dream indicates that the dreamer’s situation will improve soon and he will move to a better financial level. Interpretation of the dream of selling a house by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the dreamer’s house sold in a dream indicates the financial pressures he is currently exposed to. He also believes that seeing a house sold in a dream is to buy a house New is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of all the fears that he is currently suffering from and that he will live happily. Seeing a house being sold in a dream and feeling sad as a result indicates problems that the dreamer will face that will be difficult to overcome. Ibn Sirin also explained that seeing a house being sold to someone Known and receiving a large sum of money means that the viewer will accept the least completion of a large project through which he earns a lot of money. Interpretation of selling a house in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing a house being sold in a dream indicates some changes that the viewer will experience in his life during the coming period. Seeing yourself selling a house to an unknown person, according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, is evidence of getting rid of all the financial worries that the dreamer is currently suffering from. Whoever dreams that he is selling his house and removing all his family members from the house, this is evidence that he will face a big problem at work. Seeing yourself selling a house in A dream and a feeling of sadness indicate the tension and bad psychological state that the dreamer feels at this time in his life. If you see a man in a dream that he is selling his house against his will, this means that his financial situation will soon improve and he will live in peace. Interpretation of a dream about selling a house to one person: Seeing an unmarried woman In a dream it means that she is selling her house and she was crying, it means that she will soon take on some responsibilities in her life. If a single woman dreams that she is selling her house to someone

title: Interpretation of lice in the hair of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing lice in the hair of a dead person in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the heirs of the dead person are preparing his possessions and possessions that the deceased hid in preparation for distributing them to them. We point out the lies of God and what he does from the core of the facts. Seeing the dead person killing lice in a dream is a sign that the dead person is harming one of his servants. In his life. Killing lice in a dream, as interpreters have told us, is a sign of getting rid of the sins that the dreamer is accustomed to committing. Interpretation of dead lice in a dream for a single woman: Many scholars, such as Ibn Sirin and others, believe that dead lice are present in the dream. Evidence On the abundance of livelihood, and obtaining the money that the fortuneteller will receive in the next stage of his life. Killing a louse indicates that the one seeing his injustice is close to him and hiding it from the world. Then killing the lice, and getting rid of them in the dream means that the dreamer will get rid of all the problems and crises that have interrupted him recently. The last about his real life. The inability to get rid of lice in a dream, and its presence on the head in large numbers, indicates the dreamer’s inability to get rid of the problems that he suffers from in his life. Explains: They kill lice. Seeing it dead in a dream means paying off debts that have accumulated in large amounts on the viewer, and the viewer feels With psychological comfort about it. Interpretation of seeing dead lice in Ibn Sirin’s hair. Wahid in the vision of head lice. Dream interpreters said that it is evidence that there are people near her who hate her. Hatred and are ready to harm them. Getting rid of lice on her head. Seeing it dead is news of overcoming difficulties. And the disturbances that interrupted her life caused her some harm. Seeing lice in a dream indicates the achievement of the goals sought by the dreamer. Some commentators also warned that seeing lice is a warning to her mother about the person who will be associated with her, and it is an indication of his bad character. Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair and killing a married woman in a dream: killing lice in Dreams for married women indicate the stability of her married life as a result of getting rid of the problems that may have arisen between her and her husband, and enjoying psychological and family stability. As for her vision of her inability to get rid of lice and kill it, she says that the problems she faces in her married life still exist. It also suggests getting rid of accumulated debts. She must feel peace and stability in her life. Killing ants in a dream for a married woman says about her ability to get rid of her close friends who have bad morals. Other dream interpreters interpreted that seeing lice in a dream is for a married woman. It could indicate that he hurt someone by saying something that he did not. Seeing lice In a child’s hair in a dream. See lice spread abundantly in the child’s hair, and it is a sign that the fortuneteller will work in the near future. Or a new source of livelihood from which you will earn money, and be a reason for the fortuneteller’s happiness. Spread some small lice in the child’s hair. It is said in the dream that among his peers there are those who hate him. And hatred Or he is surrounded by many bad friends. Seeing lice on the head of a sick child and the dreamer’s willingness to save the child

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake after dawn

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake after dawn in a dream If you, dear reader, want to know whether the interpretation of a dream about a snake after dawn in a dream portends good or not, we offer it to you through the following... Interpretation of a dream about a snake after dawn in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a snake After the break of dawn in a dream, a snake could be a sign of enemies, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a snake in a dream, this may be evidence of the presence of enemies in his life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees a snake in a dream, she can express her judgments, and God knows best. I know everything. Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees snakes in the house in a dream, this may indicate enemies, and God knows best. When you see snakes in the house without fear, it can lead to a refuge from Enemies, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees snakes in the house in a dream, this may be a sign of bad things, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of many snakes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of many snakes in a dream could express enemies, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees many snakes in a dream, he may This indicates envy, and God knows best. Likewise, if a married woman sees many snakes in a dream, it may represent cunning, and God knows best. When a young man sees many snakes in a dream, this may indicate enemies and an increase in their number, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of many black snakes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of many black snakes. Black snakes in a dream may represent powerful enemies, and God knows best. Seeing many black snakes may represent powerful enemies, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you see black snakes, they may express harm, and God knows the unseen, as it may express an enemy’s attempt to harm the dreamer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a gray snake. Large in a dream: The interpretation of a dream about the presence of a large gray snake in a dream could be a sign of a period of distress, and God knows best. It may indicate that he is going through a period of distress that saddens him, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a large gray snake in a dream, this may represent betrayal or difficult judgments, and God knows best. I know the unseen. title: I dreamed that I was wearing a red dress

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a red dress in a dream for a single girl: On the one hand, for an unmarried girl to see in her dream wearing a red dress, and see herself who is beautiful in the dress. It indicates that the girl has a feeling of happiness and positivity, which she imposes on everyone around her. Also, seeing A girl wearing a red dress indicates her beautiful soul, which makes everyone love her. If a girl dreams that she is going to the market with her mother, and buys a red dress, and the dress is suitable for her body and attractive from the first time she wears it. Evidence that the girl will be proposed by a young man in a short time, and that they are tying the knot There is a big engagement party. She will be filled with great happiness with this young man and the marriage will end. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a red dress, the dress has some noticeable dirt. The size of the dress seems inappropriate on her body and inappropriate for her. This vision was interpreted as not good for a girl One and that it indicates evil. It also appears that she will love something and wait for it, but it will not come true and she will have a bad psychological state. See also: Interpretation of dreams about wearing an evening dress for single women. Interpretation of seeing a red dress in a dream for a married woman. A married woman wears the red dress in her dream, and looks at herself in the mirror and finds herself attractive and beautiful in the dream. The vision indicates that the dreamer will receive great love in the family and in her life. It indicates that she loves understanding and an organized life with her children and husband and that her family is happy. A married woman goes to the tailor and asks him to design a red dress and asks him to To be her size. This vision indicates that it portends the arrival of a new child in her life and that the gender of the fetus will be a girl. This little girl will be like her mother in everything, until everyone notices her. Seeing a married woman wearing a red dress, but she is in a state of tension and the dress will eclipse, because it does not It covers her entire body. The dream shows her involvement in many life-changing problems. These problems could be with her family or husband and in the workplace. The problems make her feel depressed and think about leaving her field of work. Interpretation of seeing a red dress in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man sees his wife in a dream She is wearing a red dress that has many scratches and is torn in many places. The dream shows that the man’s family situation with his wife is not good and that their life has many problems. It also shows that he is trying hard to repair this relationship, but it is getting worse. Seeing a man in his dream buying a red dress and presenting it to his wife He intends to wear it on some occasion. This dream is a good omen for the man. It indicates changes in his personal life for the better. His life will become much better and the change will be good for his wife and improve the marital relationship between them. Read also: A caftan in a dream. The meaning of seeing a red dress in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman She wears a long red dress and is happy with it while wearing it. Senior commentators interpreted this vision as meaning that she will give birth through a natural process and she and her fetus will be transferred safely. Seeing a pregnant woman finding her husband buying her a red dress, then she finds...

title: Seeing cats being expelled from the house for singles according to Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of seeing cats being left in a dream for singles

preview.html: Seeing cats being chased from the house in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that cause confusion and anxiety about what cats represent in real life, as the cat is a lively animal that symbolizes frequent movement, speed, and inability to stabilize, but at the same time it is one of the animals that most expresses warmth and familiarity, so It can indicate problems as well as joy, happiness, and good events. Interpretation of seeing cats being expelled from the house in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing cats being expelled from the house in a dream for a single woman. This vision often indicates many associations, some of which are good and others are not. It can also describe the personal characteristics of the fortuneteller, depending on the color, number, and shape of the cats. If the cats are white, then expelling them carries bad connotations, because it indicates the dreamer’s poor morals, and makes people alienate those around them and lose a lot. Chasing unclean cats indicates that the dreamer is She is one of those personalities who cares a lot about her appearance and gives priority to her clothes and elegance, even if it costs money. As for driving away gray cats, it expresses the solution of difficult problems and crises, especially those related to material matters that she has been suffering from for a long time. While cats are predatory and aggressive, chasing them expresses About a character distinguished by courage and courage to stand up to injustice and do everything in his power to overcome it. To know Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site... You will find everything you are looking for. Interpretation of seeing cats being expelled from the house in a dream for a single woman to Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that this vision has a good meaning as long as it foretells some bad events, but it also carries some warning messages from people or external dangers. If the cats are half black and the other grey, then this is a warning that there are people near the dreamer who pretend to be loyal and tender to them, But they have hatred and hatred in their hearts. But if the cats are white, small, and with colored eyes, then this means that they will be driven away from the path of truth, following desires and temptations, and committing many sins. Whereas if the cats are expelled because of their frequent meowing and agitation, this means that The fortuneteller will be able to change a lot in her life in the near future and achieve a big leap in her standard of living. Interpretation of seeing a cat being kicked out of the house in a dream for a single womanThis vision often has multiple connotations determined by the shape and color of cats. If she chases black people away, this expresses the bad company that surrounds her and causes her. Problems and crises spoil their morals, but if cats have a lot of movement and activity, it is an expression of visual distancing from harassment or suffering. Cats always prefer to be left alone to have sufficient peace of mind, but in general, this dream expresses a serious and honest person who hates manipulation, doubts and people Counterfeiters or counterfeiters. Seeing a cat leaving the house in a dream for a single woman. Some believe that this vision shows that the dreamer is characterized by strictness in life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about Friday prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream about Friday prayer

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Friday prayer: It is a blessing in livelihood, good reputation, and moral obligation if the dreamer completes it, but if he interrupts it or neglects it. Here we find other interpretations, so let us get to know the interpretation of the dream as stated in the sayings. From the great interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about Friday prayer in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about Friday prayer in a dream? In the words of all dream interpreters without exception, this vision expresses the great goodness and comfort that the dreamer finds in his life, especially if he is going through a difficult period in his life and seeks refuge. To his Lord in supplication. Seeing Friday prayers in a dream in the mosque and around him by many people he knows and loves, congratulating them that there are pleasant and happy events in which he lives at the present time, and it makes him feel peace and comfort after it has become his life. More stable. Leaving the mosque after finishing prayer is a sign of fulfilling his desires and achieving all his goals and aspirations. Perhaps a person sees that it is another day and prays Friday, and this means his belief in heresies and misguidance, and his escaping from heresies and misguidance. As for his prayer for it, especially on Saturday, it is a sign that his He has Jewish friends and his heart is with them, and this is what religion has forbidden. In the case of his prayer on Sunday, he is too attached to Christians, and cares more about their friendship than the friendship of Muslims. If the dreamer seeks knowledge, then praying Friday prayers on time in the dream and going to the mosque before the imam ascends the pulpit Evidence of his bright future and unparalleled superiority, as he gains a high scientific status in the future. You will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dreams and visions on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Friday prayer in a dream for single people, and most important of all is that this girl does not suffer from any problems in her life, On the contrary, seeing her performing the Friday prayer behind an imam in the mosque is a sign that she lives happily and is surrounded by everyone’s love. But if she does that on a day other than Friday, she will enter into a big dilemma, because she is wrongly choosing the person she wants to marry. In the future, as a result of this choice, she faces many problems with her family. The vision indicates that the girl has a good reputation among people, because of her religion and her desire not to follow in the footsteps of Satan. Seeing herself and many women around her praying is an expression of her close marriage to someone He is committed to a religion that loves her, values ​​her, and treats her in a way that pleases God. Seeing Friday prayers in a dream for a married woman. A woman’s dream of performing Friday prayers on time indicates that she enjoys her husband’s love for her and his respect for her, for things that he does not oblige her to do as a wife, such as taking care of his sick mother or something similar. If she is a mistress. She is a homemaker and not a worker. She takes care of her children, takes care of her husband’s comfort, and is committed to helping the husband and providing a peaceful atmosphere for him so that he can practice his work. The dream is a sign that there is a lot of goodness, and her husband will come soon and work to improve the family’s living conditions. Her standing in front of her friends in prayer is evidence However, she always advises them and directs them to do what is best for them, and also to do what is best for them

title: Interpretation of a dream about burning hair according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing hair burning in a dream means health problems, suffering, and other interpretations that we will explain to single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, such as hair catching fire and burning hair, or burning the ends of hair. I dream of my daughter’s hair on fire, or cutting burned hair, or burning hair, a child, burning hair with an iron. Burning a strand of hair, burning leg hair, back hair, arm hair or nose hair. By Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others at the bottom of the thread: Interpretation of burning hair in a dream. Seeing hair burning in a dream does not explain well to the person and indicates a problem related to his health. Seeing hair burning in a dream is a sign of an illness that requires long treatment. Seeing your hair burning in a dream at the same time means separation. Or divorce at home. A person who saw his hair burning in an accident in the vision will face a problem related to the workplace. Whoever dreams of burning hair indicates wrong actions. A dream of burning hair indicates a narrow life and the dreamer’s participation in a failed business. Seeing someone else’s hair burning indicates slander that will occur Yours and someone will get rid of it without feeling guilty, but they will feel remorse afterward. Seeing burnt hair in a dream indicates the occurrence of some late events that you have always wanted to happen, and indicates the occurrence of irreparable mistakes. Seeing hair falling out in a dream is a sign of lack of Knowledge of any work for young people. Broken or burned hair for married people reflects his bad condition and that he will be an unacceptable person from the husband’s family. The vision of burning hair is also interpreted pessimistically and symbolizes the people who are about to get married retreating from the idea of ​​their marriage at the last minute. Psychological commentary on the dream of burning hair appears The vision is that a person has a sexually unwanted life and does not create healthy relationships with the opposite sex due to some problems and is not happy. At the same time, seeing burnt hair in a dream indicates that he is a shy person because of his sense of himself as worthless in the eyes of society, and his introversion. And his loneliness is due to his lack of social adaptation to others. According to dream interpretation scholars, seeing burning hair portends profit and success. Since seeing long hair symbolizes an upcoming trip when you see long hair burning in a dream, this means that the trip will be delayed or canceled for some reason. Seeing your hair burning on your head is A sign of intense emotional tension and symbolizes the limited emotions that the dreamer is trying to control. Also, the dream of burning hair tells you that perhaps if you discover the reason for your discomfort that is causing your bad mood and identify the problem, you will be able to make progress in solving this problem. If people who like to communicate see a dream about Burning hair, they may fall into an unfortunate act with their loved ones, as a result of which you will lose your reputation and respect for others. For men who are engaged in business, this dream of burning hair is a recommendation to rely only on themselves and not shift responsibility to partners or family members. If you see one of your acquaintances as If his hair is on fire in a dream, this is a sign of an unexpected struggle or conflict
